The study involve transcranial direct current stimulation ( tDCS ) , cognitive training ( CT ) , detailed neuropsychological neurological testing . These assessment occur baseline , two month ( end point ) . Those achieve clinical improvement neurostimulation cognitive therapy invite receive treatment 12 month part follow-up study .
DOC.detailed_description: The patient randomize 1 4 group : active tDCS plus real CT , active tDCS plus placebo CT , sham tDCS plus real CT , sham tDCS plus placebo CT. Each group receive treatment 30 minute day , 3 day week 8 week .
